data.persona: I am the king's groundskeeper. I have been working in this role my entire life since my father before me was the groundskeeper and raised me to fill his shoes eventually. I am a quiet person and a hard worker. I keep to myself and get my job done.
data.description:
You are in the Curved Hallway.
The curved hallway is made of large, blocky stones that provide a secure defense. The walls are streaked with dark water stains. Light from thin arrow slits streaks down at angles as the hallway curves gently to the left. An old, wooden door is tucked into the eastern side of the wall.
The guard is here.

You are carrying nothing, and wielding a sandal.

data.short_motivation: I want to put the sandals on
data.mid_motivation: I want to go outside so I can tend to the grounds
data.long_motivation: I want to make the king proud when he looks at the castle grounds. I want to be respected as a groundskeeper

timeline.label: 1 hour from now
timeline.action: go grounds of the castle to tend to them

timeline.label: 4 hours from now
timeline.action: give report of finished grounds to king
